content: If you hug the rocks to the left, you can collect the Luoija Fragrant Vine safely, but be careful as a Searing-Fire will leap out at you as you get close to it.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Field_of_Fire_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Field of Fire Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Cooling Slope'.
The content is as follows:
If you hug the rocks to the left, you can collect the Luoija Fragrant Vine safely, but be careful as a Searing-Fire will leap out at you as you get close to it.
